title: hold_brc
author: hold_brc
content: Hi guys.thanks a bunch for the btc's development and impact,more and more holders' life become more colorful.For u guys be more firmly hold BTC and ETH,i creat a new brc-20 token:HOBE.HOBE(HODL BTC AND ETH,OR U WILL NOT BEÂ  RICH.)Free mint but amount limited on https://unisat.io/brc20/hobeIt's an interesting experiment to see what will happen soon.offial twittercontact:https://twitter.com/hobe_brc

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: Wrong board to post about your altcoin project, you have to move this thread to altcoin discussion or service board, this board is for Bitcoin discussion and even though you mentioned Bitcoin a couple of times in your post doesn't make the entire thread fit into this board.

comments.author: Artemis3
comments.body: But its more spam being announced to clog Bitcoin and make it worse than Ethereum. Its honest for the spammer to announce it here instead of simply watching the mempool mysteriously getting worse and worse. Well its not like the other spammers would ever announce it here anyway...
